text: Members of the Senedd (MSs for short) are elected members of the Welsh Parliament. They represent the people from the different areas of Wales. They are elected for a four year term.Mark Ryan, Steve Foster, Unlocking Constitutional and Administrative Law (Oxford; New York: Routledge, 2014), p. 374 ==Related pages== * Senedd Cymru (Welsh Parliament) * Welsh Government == References == Category:Politics of Wales
title: Member of the Senedd
